name: Ka-Ku
description:
You have been absover by the movie, and you now have to look the way to get out of there, is just a 3 short and easy game.  instructions will be oin the folder with the game.

INSTRUCTIONS
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
W -Jump
Q - Interact with the selected object
Click on Highlighted object to interact
